algorithm: My new algorithm calculates the scores for bin assignment by taking the element-wise ratio of the item size to each bin capacity, then subtracting the ratio of the total rest capacities of the bins to the maximum bin capacity. Finally, the scores are calculated as the square root of the result, and the final scores are sorted in descending order.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    total_rest_capacity = np.sum(bins)
    ratio = item / bins
    total_rest_capacity_ratio = total_rest_capacity / max_capacity
    
    scores = np.sqrt(ratio - total_rest_capacity_ratio)
    sorted_scores = np.sort(scores)[::-1]
    return scores
